updates.rollingUpdateDescription: Rolling Update allows you to update Proxmox nodes sequentially, automatically migrating VMs before each update to avoid service interruption.
updates.rebootRequiredKernel: A kernel update requires a reboot
updates.upToDate: All nodes are up to date
updates.localVmsBlocking: {count} VM(s) with local storage blocking migration
updates.localVmsWithReplication: {count} VM(s) with replication can be migrated
updates.localVmsBlockingMigration: These VMs prevent automatic update because they have local storage
